Package meico.mpm.elements.metadata

Class Metadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.metadata.Metadata
  • public class Metadata
extends AbstractXmlSubtree
    This class interfaces the metadata of the MPM instance.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
